description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: An issue in iTop DualSafe Password Manager & Digital Vault before 1.4.24 allows a local attacker to obtain sensitive information via leaked credentials as plaintext in a log file that can be accessed by the local user without knowledge of the master secret.

Un problema en iTop DualSafe Password Manager & Digital Vault anterior a 1.4.24 permite a un atacante local obtener información confidencial a través de credenciales filtradas como texto plano en un archivo de registro al que puede acceder el usuario local sin conocer el secreto maestro.
